name: Lost Bits (Demo)
description:
Lost Bits

What if you could cut+paste in real life?

1980s  robot Clip uses his fabulous abilities to collect  new shortcuts and make quite a mess  of the idyllic  suburbs of Pleasant Pines.  If one thing is for sure, it's that the  home owner's association won't like this!

Gamepad support

A gamepad is recommended.  Please connect your gamepad prior to launching Lost Bits, as this demo does not support plug-and-play.

Controls
JumpCut*Paste*Dash*PauseKeyboardXCVDReturnXBoxABXRTMenuPlaystationXCircleSquare
R1Options

*  Some abilities are not available until you collect the proper upgrade. Look for bits and floppy disks.

Team

Lost Bits was made by Nick Sayre + Phillip Aske. Lindsay Sayre composed the music, and Breakbeat Heartbeat composed the credits music.

Get emailed when we release more  Lost Bits

This demo represents the first chapter of Lost Bits, a larger game we'd very much like to fully realize.  To   be emailed whenever we release more of the game subscribe.
